questions.text: Match the following - Select the correct answer from the given below code:
questions.explanation:
Solution:

A-4, B-1, C-3, D-2 The correct match are Twilight state – Impaired level of conciousness Oneroid state – Oneirophrenia Oligophrenia – Subnormal intelligence Paranoid ideation – Persecution Twilight state – State of disturbed consciousness along with hallucinations Oneiroid state – Dream like delusional derangement of consciousness in which patient is not fully oriented to time and place Oligophrenia – It refers to the group of mental states characterized by subnormal levels of intellectual activity Paranoid ideation – Thinking that is dominated by persecutory, suspicious or grandiose contents

questions.text: Match the following: Select the correct answer from the given below code:
questions.explanation:
Solution:

1 – b, 2 – d, 3 – c, 4 – a The correct match are : Suicide – Women physicians, substance abuse, relationalship problems Burn out – State of emotional and physical exhaustion caused by prolonged stress and relieved after relaxation Depression – Difficult to diagnose due to shell of physician’s pride Over working – Feeling that goes away as soon as you leave the hospital

questions.text: A person often feels that his hands are dirty and urge to wash his hands. Recently he noticed that these repetitive, distressing thoughts of hand washing is affecting his performance. What is the best treatment option for him?
questions.explanation:
Solution:

Exposure and response prevention The clinical features in this patient suggests Obsessive compulsive disorder. Cognitive behavioural therapy (CBT) It is based on the psychological significance of the cognitive triad People’s belief about themselves their personal world their future

Highyeild:

CBT is used in the treatment of depression phobia anxiety and panic disorders OCD personality disorders somatoform disorders

Random:

Explanation for incorrect options:- Option A. Exposure and response prevention – It is effective in OCD. It is one of the CBT methods that is used in the treatment of OCD. Other CBT methods used are Psychoeduaction and cognitive therapy. Option B. Dialectical behavioral therapy (DBT) : It is a long term behavioural intervention that is shown to reduce suicidal behaviour in adults Option C. Systemic desensitisation : In this the person overcomes anxiety elicited by a situation or an object by approaching the feared situation gradually in a relaxed state.

questions.text: Which of the following is not classified as OCRD as per ICD 11?
questions.explanation:
Solution:

Post traumatic stress disorder Post traumatic stress disorder is not classified under OCRD in ICD 11 Obsessive compulsive or related disorder as per ICD 11 These are the group of disorders characterised by repitative thoughts and behaviors that are similar in etiology and important diagnostic validators. It includes : Obsessive compulsive disorder Body dysmorphic disorder Hypochondriasis Trichotillomania Hoarding disorder Olfactory reference disorder
